sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Gallery from './Gallery' import { myRecipes } from '../DAL/api' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' const MyRecipes = () => { const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState([]) useEffect(async () => { const id = Cookies.get('user') const response = await myRecipes(id) setRecipes(response) }, []) return < div className='d-flex flex-wrap justify-content-center' > {recipes.length > 0 && newRecipes.map((recipe, i) => (

{recipe.name}

  • {recipe.prepTimeMin} Minutes
  • {recipe.views}
  • 2 People
)) } } export default MyRecipes;
